//http://www.codechef.com/problems/IOPC1203

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

#define MAXSIZE 100002

char s[MAXSIZE];
int ans_3[MAXSIZE*4];
int ans_4[MAXSIZE*4];
int n;

int getKey(char c);
int getKeyCount(char c);
int getKeyCharCount(int key);

int func(int x, int c)
{
	if(c==3)
	{
		return ans_3[x];
	}
	else
	{
		return ans_4[x];
	}

}

int main()
{
	ans_3[0] = ans_4[0] = 0;
	ans_3[1] = ans_4[1] = 1;
	ans_3[2] = ans_4[2] = 2;
	ans_3[3] = ans_4[3] = 4;
	ans_3[4] = ans_4[4] = 8;
	ans_3[5] = 15;
	ans_4[5] = 16;

	for (int x = 6; x<MAXSIZE*4; x++)
	{
	ans_3[x] = (ans_3[x-1]+ans_3[x-2]+ans_3[x-3]+1)%100000007;
	ans_4[x] = (ans_4[x-1]+ans_4[x-2]+ans_4[x-3]+ans_4[x-4]+1)%100000007;
	}
	int tests;
	scanf("%d\n", &tests);
	while(tests--)
	{
		gets(s);
		n = strlen(s);
		long long res = 1;

		for(int i=0; i<n; )
		{
			int key = getKey(s[i]);
			int count = getKeyCount(s[i]);
			i++;
			while(i<n)
			{
				if(getKey(s[i]) == key)
					count += getKeyCount(s[i]);
				else
					break;
				i++;
			}

			res = (res * (long long)func(count, getKeyCharCount(key)))%100000007;
		}

		printf("%d\n", res);
	}

	return 0;
}

int getKeyCharCount(int key)
{
	switch (key)
	{
	case 2:
	case 3:
	case 4:
	case 5:
	case 6:
	case 8:
		return 3;
	case 7:
	case 9:
	default:
		return 4;
	}
}

int getKey(char c)
{
	switch (c)
	{
	case 'a':
	case 'b':
	case 'c':
		return 2;
	case 'd':
	case 'e':
	case 'f':
		return 3;
	case 'g':
	case 'h':
	case 'i':
		return 4;
	case 'j':
	case 'k':
	case 'l':
		return 5;
	case 'm':
	case 'n':
	case 'o':
		return 6;
	case 'p':
	case 'q':
	case 'r':
	case 's':
		return 7;
	case 't':
	case 'u':
	case 'v':
		return 8;
	case 'w':
	case 'x':
	case 'y':
	case 'z':
	default:
		return 9;
	}
}

int getKeyCount(char c)
{
	switch (c)
	{
	case 'a':
	case 'd':
	case 'g':
	case 'j':
	case 'm':
	case 'p':
	case 't':
	case 'w':
		return 1;
	case 'b':
	case 'e':
	case 'h':
	case 'k':
	case 'n':
	case 'q':
	case 'u':
	case 'x':
		return 2;
	case 'c':
	case 'f':
	case 'i':
	case 'l':
	case 'o':
	case 'r':
	case 'v':
	case 'y':
		return 3;
	case 's':
	case 'z':
	default:
		return 4;
	}
}
